p:
In a study by Kuhta et al,
22 pH factor was reported to significantly affect ion release. In the study above, more visible ions were released at a pH of 3.5, compared to those at a pH of 6.75 after a 28-day immersion period.Mihardjanti et al
23 studied Ni and Cr ion release from stainless steel brackets immersed in various types of mouthwash. They reported that Listerine mouthwash resulted in the release of the highest amounts of Ni and Cr ions.
